class_notes: Prerequisites: Biol 142 + 142L AND Permission of instructor. Estimated Cost of field trip is $1200.00. Contact Dr. Dave Civitello at dcivite@emory.edu for permission. This course will fulfill Column C (or elective credit) and the upper-level laboratory requirement for the Biology major. See the Course Atlas for additional information.
course_description: Emphasizes basic principles of coastal ecology, human impact on coastal ecosystems, and the diversity of organisms living in these ecosystems. The course involves an eight-day laboratory/field trip to St. Simons Island, Georgia and other Georgia Sea Islands over Spring Break.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2564, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-4p, Instructor: D. Civitello, Status: Closed
